# News Summary - 2025-02-07_16-20-07\n\nHere's a summary of today's news:

**Politics and Government**

*   [Donald Trump](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiWkFVX3lxTFBLNXM4TmZTSGMyak10dlRvNUYzV0daQzFxTW1mamp6NWdSS3VvTUVfam9EZE1OM0JiWnhzODlqN1V3RGlGTjVJbHVWWmh2UEZoMjNhYUtVbUN6UdIBX0FVX3lxTE9nWmJmek9sUTRQVnhteDJuWF9CUE01N1NMekdiWW9MYmRidEF2aXhiWVh1X1Z6bnZEZnpKam1KSm1WSlVJX2haa180aUVuMVctSWZ6bVhsOC12MzlFTDRn?oc=5) has announced he will be revoking [Joe Biden's](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiWkFVX3lxTFBLNXM4TmZTSGMyak10dlRvNUYzV0daQzFxTW1mamp6NWdSS3VvTUVfam9EZE1OM0JiWnhzODlqN1V3RGlGTjVJbHVWWmh2UEZoMjNhYUtVbUN6UdIBX0FVX3lxTE9nWmJmek9sUTRQVnhteDJuWF9CUE01N1NMekdiWW9MYmRidEF2aXhiWVh1X1Z6bnZEZnpKam1KSm1WSlVJX2haa180aUVuMVctSWZ6bVhsOC12MzlFTDRn?oc=5) security clearances, ending intelligence briefings in what is being described as a payback move.
*   A judge is set to block the [Trump administration](https://news.google.?oc=5) from placing 2,200 USAID employees on leave at midnight.
*   [House Republicans](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqgFBVV95cUxOT0FZWi0yelplYnZjaWN6TGk0VTFfbjZtMUM5R3hxNFBETUxtTXlpZjg1VW1wV1BDaGo5Q3RjTk13YUs3RU9zVnlJQ09ycUFNYi1hNmN3WktRcnZ0ckJINGFrS3ZfYi1JMXBTallYQVdBblozbjBlaUJXdEhDX1R0dmw5d21zZXVNSVc1dGE1M1Q4OU43VEYtdUpQN0xIVy1IM0ZpSkJkRktJQQ?oc=5) are closing in on a budget deal after a meeting with Trump.
*   [Trump](https://news.google.?oc=5) has signed an order delaying tariffs on de minimis imports from China.

**Business and Economics**

*   [Elon Musk](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMigAFBVV95cUxPLWFOZll4bjQwRjJjRE9peHFUdm9IRXNVbGVUczNWa1pLQURVaU9fU3BlcUFvOEZPcE1nSzU0LW8wZW5RVFVNdmZnQllMd2JpM0tfeUtRbWRCeU5qOEtkekM5bm9yYW5zM2Flb2otdngtZXpBUVBNWHdqNWU1WmhpeQ?oc=5) intends to rehire a Treasury DOGE staffer who was previously linked to racist posts, following endorsements from Trump.
*   The Transportation Department has suspended the EV charger program.
*   A new [jobs report](https://news.google.?oc=5) indicates a hiring slowdown, with companies reportedly acting as though "they're in a recession."
*   [Cracker Barrel](https://news.google.?oc=5) fires back at [Waffle House](https://news.google.?oc=5) for adding a surcharge to eggs

**Technology**

**World Affairs**
